prompt: Professional product photography of a luxury boutique wardrobe, high-end furniture photography. 3-section wardrobe with hinged doors, featuring double hanging rails visible through open doors, integrated drawer units, organized shelving. Style: architectural visualization, product photography, professional lighting.
